text: The Villa Castelli helicopter crash occurred on 9 March 2015 when two helicopters collided near Villa Castelli in north-west Argentina. All 10 people on board the two aircraft were killed. Florence Arthaud, Camille Muffat and Alexis Vastine were passengers. title: Villa Castelli helicopter crash
